subject: Simsonn pro x ultra not working
description_text: Hi i have issue with my newly purchased simsonn pro x ultra pedal. I installed the simsonn manager software to calibrate and after that i try to test with the lemans ultimate but the device is not working although it detected by the game so i try to recalibrate again but same thing happen i also try it to assetto corsa competizione but still same result.just for additional info My wheel base is thrustmaster t598 is there something i missing about i hope you could help me pls.

conversations.body_text: Hi kurt laina,  ​Please first update the software to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. Then, in the "Settings - Update" section, click "Manual Firmware Update", navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. After the update is complete, please test again.

Unfortunately it still not working i already you intruction but still same issue im stress now

On Sun, 10 Aug 2025, 2:53 pm service @simsonn.com,

Hi kurt laina,    you can download the Todesk tool (no registration required). Once installed, please provide your ID and temporary password, and I’ll assist you remotely.  https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe
